Name: Zingy Ginger Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: It sure is both zingy and gingery.
History: Created in 2001 by Reece Clark at Hush Up, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Zingy Ginger Cocktail contains 204 calories
